description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability associated with CVE-2024-29994 affecting the Microsoft Windows SCSI class system file:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, use KB5037771: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, use KB5037771: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2, use KB5037770: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, use KB5037768: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2, use KB5037768: [Download](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For 32-bit systems for both Windows 10 and 11, apply the appropriate KB5037768 as well.

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a potential out-of-bounds read vulnerability that may allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges on Windows systems.
- Confirm you are applying the updates that correspond to your version and architecture of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
